api.name: MasterLayoutComponent
api.usage: This component takes care of the structure of the application and should be used in app.component.html

inputs.name: skipLinks
inputs.text: A List of Links to be used as skiplinks in order to improve accessibility.

inputs.name: navigation
inputs.text: A list of links to populate the primary navigation. If more control on the navigation is needed, use [obNavigation] content projection (see below) instead

projection.name: [obHeader]
projection.text: Content that will be projected as the main header, i.e. everything above the read line. It will replace the default Oblique header if custom header is enabled (see ObMasterLayoutConfig).

projection.name: [obHeaderTitle]
projection.text: Content that will be projected as the application's title within the main header.

projection.name: [obHeaderAction]
projection.text: Content that will be projected before the application's logo (only visible in expanded layout).

projection.name: <ng-template #obHeaderLogo>
projection.text: Content that will be projected as the application's logo (an img is expected) within the main header. It will replace the default Confederation logo.

projection.name: [obNavigation]
projection.text: Content that will be projected as the main navigation. It will replace the default Oblique navigation if no navigation links are provided. It is an alternative to navigation input but the whole navigation markup has to be provided, not only the links.

projection.name: [obLocales]
projection.text: Content that will be projected as the locales choice. It will replace the default Oblique locales if locale management is disabled (see ObMasterLayoutConfig).

projection.name: [obHeaderCustomControl]
projection.text: Content that will be projected as the custom controls section of the main header (next to the locales choice)

projection.name: <ng-template #obHeaderControl>
projection.text: Templates that will be projected into the controls section of the main header (next to the custom control section).

projection.name: <ng-template #obHeaderMobileControl>
projection.text: Templates that will be projected into the controls section of the main header (next to the locales choice) for mobile layout.

projection.name: [obFooter]
projection.text: Content that will be projected as the main footer. It will replace the default Oblique footer if custom footer is enabled (see ObMasterLayoutConfig).

projection.name: [obFooterInfo]
projection.text: Content that will be projected into the left hand side of the footer.

projection.name: <ng-template #obFooterLink>
projection.text: Templates that will be projected into the links section in the right hand side of the main footer.

projection.name: [obOffCanvasTitle]
projection.text: Content that will be projected as the title of the main off-canvas if off canvas is enabled (see ObMasterLayoutConfig).

projection.name: [obOffCanvasContent]
projection.text: Content that will be projected as the content of the main off-canvas if off canvas is enabled (see ObMasterLayoutConfig).

tokens.name: OB_HIDE_EXTERNAL_LINKS_IN_MAIN_NAVIGATION
tokens.text: Indicates if the a11y icon should be hidden in the main navigation.

tokens.name: OB_PAMS_CONFIGURATION
tokens.text: Provides the mandatory PAMS environment as well as an optional root url. This is only useful when OB_ACTIVATE_SERVICE_NAVIGATION is enabled.

tokens.name: OB_ACTIVATE_SERVICE_NAVIGATION
tokens.text: Indicates whether or not the service navigation component should be used instead of the header controls area.

api.name: ObMasterLayoutConfig
api.usage: This is the default configuration of the master layout. Values can be tweaked by injecting this service into app.module.ts to customize the global structure of the application.

variables.name: homePageRoute
variables.text: The home page route. A click on the confederation logos or on the application's title will trigger this route.

variables.name: focusableFragments
variables.text: The ids corresponding to these fragments are focusable.

variables.name: scrollToTopDuration
variables.text: Duration, in milliseconds, of the scroll to top feature.

variables.name: locale.locales
variables.text: A list of supported locales, conforming to the ISO 639-1 standard. An optional country code conforming to the ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 standard can be appended with a hyphen.

variables.name: locale.defaultLanguage
variables.text: The default language, used when none is actually chosen or if the chosen one is not valid.

variables.name: locale.disabled
variables.text: Let Oblique handles locales (false) or completely disables Oblique language management (true). In ths case, the application have to provide a default language as well as a change language mechanism

variables.name: locale.display
variables.text: Show Oblique's buttons for language selection or not

variables.name: layout.hasCover
variables.text: Use regular layout (false) or cover layout (true). The cover layout uses only part of the available width and displays a background image on the unused space.

variables.name: layout.hasLayout
variables.text: Apply default padding (true) to the main-layout or no padding at all (false).

variables.name: layout.hasMainNavigation
variables.text: Use Oblique's default main navigation (true) or a custom one (false). The custom navigation has to be provided through [obNavigation].

variables.name: layout.hasOffCanvas
variables.text: Add an off-canvas on the main content level (true) or removes it. An off-canvas is a collapsible sidebar that partially takes the place of the contend if activated.

variables.name: layout.hasMaxWidth
variables.text: Limit the width of the main element on very big screens.

variables.name: header.isSticky
variables.text: The header is always shown above the content (true) or hidden when scrolled away (false).

variables.name: header.isSmall
variables.text: Forces the small variant of the header.

variables.name: header.isCustom
variables.text: Use Oblique's default header (false) or a custom one (true). The custom header has to be provided through [obHeader].

variables.name: header.reduceOnScroll
variables.text: Reduce the header's size when the page is scrolled (true) or keep the header to its default size (false).

variables.name: header.serviceNavigation
variables.text: The default configuration for the service navigation. This property is readonly to ensure no option is set to undefined.

variables.name: navigation.isFullWidth
variables.text: Should drop-downs main navigation menus take the full available width or only use the needed space.

variables.name: navigation.scrollMode
variables.text: Controls the main navigation's scroll mode, i.e. how to handle the elements outside of the visible area. They can either be hidden or the navigation bar can be made scrollable to display those elements.

variables.name: navigation.scrollDelta
variables.text: The size, in pixels, of a scroll increment for a scrollable navigation.

variables.name: navigation.activeClass
variables.text: The class that will be automatically added on active links.

variables.name: navigation.links
variables.text: The main navigation links. It is an alternative to navigation input with a lesser priority.

variables.name: footer.isSmall
variables.text: Forces the small variant of the footer.

variables.name: footer.isCustom
variables.text: Use Oblique's default footer (false) or a custom one (true). The custom footer has to be provided through [obFooter].

variables.name: footer.hasLogoOnScroll
variables.text: Show the Confederation's logo in the footer when the page is scrolled.

api.name: ObMasterLayoutService
api.usage: A service to configure the master layout. The changes are live.

variables.name: homePageRouteChange$
variables.text: Emits every time the homePageRoute property changes.

variables.name: homePageRoute
variables.text: The route to the home page that is used in the header and footer.

variables.name: header
variables.text: A reference to the service that configures the header(see below)

variables.name: footer
variables.text: A reference to the service that configures the footer (see below)

variables.name: navigation
variables.text: A reference to the service that configures the navigation (see below)

variables.name: layout
variables.text: A reference to the service that configures the master layout (see below)

api.name: ObMasterLayoutComponentService
api.usage: A service to configure the master layout component. The changes are live.

variables.name: configEvents$
variables.text: Emits every time one of its property is changed

variables.name: isMenuOpened
variables.text: In collapsed mode, closes the hamburger menu (false) or opens it (true).

variables.name: hasCover
variables.text: Controls ObMasterLayoutConfig.layout.hasCover property.

variables.name: hasLayout
variables.text: Controls ObMasterLayoutConfig.layout.hasLayout property.

variables.name: hasOffCanvas
variables.text: Controls ObMasterLayoutConfig.layout.hasOffCanvas property.

variables.name: hasMainNavigation
variables.text: Controls ObMasterLayoutConfig.layout.hasMainNavigation property.

variables.name: hasMaxWidth
variables.text: Controls ObMasterLayoutConfig.layout.hasMaxWidth property.

api.name: ObMasterLayoutHeaderService
api.usage: A service to configure the master layout header. The changes are live.

variables.name: configEvents$
variables.text: Emits every time one of its property is changed

variables.name: loginState$
variables.text: Emits every time the login state changes

variables.name: logoutTriggered
variables.text: Emits the logout URL when the user clicks on the service navigation's logout button with the handleLogout input set to false.

variables.name: isCustom
variables.text: Controls ObMasterLayoutConfig.header.isCustom property.

variables.name: isSmall
variables.text: Controls ObMasterLayoutConfig.header.isSmall property.

variables.name: isSticky
variables.text: Controls ObMasterLayoutConfig.header.isSticky property.

variables.name: reduceOnScroll
variables.text: Controls ObMasterLayoutConfig.header.reduceOnScroll property.

variables.name: serviceNavigationConfiguration
variables.text: Controls ObMasterLayoutConfig.header.serviceNavigation property.

api.name: ObMasterLayoutFooterService
api.usage: A service to configure the master layout footer. The changes are live.

variables.name: configEvents$
variables.text: Emits every time one of its property is changed

variables.name: isSticky
variables.text: Controls ObMasterLayoutConfig.footer.isSticky property.

variables.name: isCustom
variables.text: Controls ObMasterLayoutConfig.footer.isCustom property.

variables.name: hasLogoOnScroll
variables.text: Controls ObMasterLayoutConfig.footer.hasLogoOnScroll property.

api.name: ObMasterLayoutNavigationService
api.usage: A service to configure the master layout navigation. The changes are live.

variables.name: configEvents$
variables.text: Emits every time one of its property is changed

variables.name: isFullWidth
variables.text: Controls ObMasterLayoutConfig.navigation.isFullWidth property.

variables.name: scrollMode
variables.text: Controls ObMasterLayoutConfig.navigation.scrollMode property.

variables.name: scrolled
variables.text: Emits when the navigation is scrolled. The payload is the scrolled delta in pixels

variables.name: refreshed
variables.text: Emits when the navigation is refreshed.

methods.name: refresh
methods.text: When scrolled navigation is enabled, forces to recompute the scroll position. Useful with dynamic navigation entries.

methods.name: scrollLeft
methods.text: When scrolled navigation is enabled, will scroll the navigation to the left by the given amout or default amount if none is given.

methods.name: scrollRight
methods.text: When scrolled navigation is enabled, will scroll the navigation to the right by the given amount or default amount if none is given.

api.name: ObINavigationLink
api.usage: The structure of a link in navigation area. A label or an icon or both have to be defined

variables.name: label
variables.text: Label to show in the link. If no label should be displayed, it will serve as tooltip and accessible text.

variables.name: url
variables.text: Url to navigate when clicking the link

variables.name: fragment
variables.text: Optional fragment to add to the URL

variables.name: queryParams
variables.text: Optional query parameters to add to the URL

variables.name: sameTarget
variables.text: Optional setting to open external links in the same window

variables.name: id
variables.text: Id of the link

variables.name: children
variables.text: Child links under the current link

variables.name: routerLinkActiveOptions
variables.text: Sets angular path-matching strategy to mark link as the active one.

variables.name: icon
variables.text: An icon to be displayed before the link's label. If no label is wished, the iconOnly option has to be activated

variables.name: iconOnly
variables.text: When false, the label will be displayed normally. When true, the label will hidden while still accessible from a screen reader and placed in a tooltip.

api.name: ObISkipLink
api.usage: The structure of a custom skiplink

variables.name: label
variables.text: An i18n key that will be translated and used as Label for this skiplink

variables.name: url
variables.text: Url to navigate when clicking the link. When typed 'current', the link points to the current Route.

variables.name: fragment
variables.text: Link Fragment

api.name: ObIPamsConfiguration
api.usage: The PAMS configuration to allow the connection with PAMS services

variables.name: environment
variables.text: The PAMS environment that will be used to build the root URL for the PAMS and ePortal links.

variables.name: rootUrl
variables.text: An alternate root URL for the PAMS and ePortal links. This take precedence over the root URL inferred from the environment.

api.name: ObIServiceNavigationConfig
api.usage: The structure of the service navigation configuration

variables.name: profileLinks
variables.text: A list of links to be displayed in the profile widget. Each link label and url are localized.

variables.name: infoLinks
variables.text: A list of links to be displayed in the info widget. Each link label and url are localized.

variables.name: infoContact
variables.text: An object with a contact phone and email.

variables.name: maxLastUsedApplications
variables.text: The maximum number of listed last used applications in the applications widget.

variables.name: maxFavoriteApplications
variables.text: The maximum number of listed favorite applications in the applications widget.

variables.name: returnUrl
variables.text: The url that will be called once the login process is complete.

variables.name: displayApplications
variables.text: Indicates if the applications widget should be displayed.

variables.name: displayAuthentication
variables.text: Indicates if the authentication widget should be displayed.

variables.name: displayInfo
variables.text: Indicates if the info widget should be displayed.

variables.name: displayLanguages
variables.text: Indicates if the language selection widget should be displayed.

variables.name: displayMessage
variables.text: Indicates if the message widget should be displayed.

variables.name: displayProfile
variables.text: Indicates if the profile widget should be displayed.

variables.name: handleLogout
variables.text: Determines if the logout should be handled in the service-navigation or not. If set to false, then the application must perform the logout itself. To do this, the logoutURL passed by the logoutTriggered output must be used.

api.name: ObIMasterLayoutEvent
api.usage: The event emitted by the master layout

variables.name: name
variables.text: The name of the event

variables.name: value
variables.text: Event value

variables.name: mode
variables.text: Scroll mode of the event

variables.name: config
variables.text: Service navigation configuration of the event
